lines.text: I'm in love for the last time in my life.
I'm in love for the first time in my life.
My friends have overlooked my shortcomings, seen me through some dark days, and brightened up the rest of them. I'm glad to have them; I'm honored to have them; I'm lucky to have them.

[at the hospital, looking at the babies in the maternity ward]
Any of them yours?
I told you, I go out of town.
[about his birthday cake]
Okay, what is it? How old are you, Murphy?
Just set the damn thing on fire!
It might be the ball cock.
Most problems start there.
Stay to supper, Murphy?
I won't do that unless I'm still here at breakfast.
How do you like your eggs?
[last lines]
I'm sixty.
[first lines]

[to Emma, who's about to put a flyer on his windshield]
Lady, you're covering up my causes.
I'm a widower. That's like catnip to a cat, in a town where the ladies outnumber you ten to one.

You are a miserable little son of a bitch, you know that? I don't know why she took you in the house... I'd bed you down with the dogs! And I'll tell you something else, mister, you may be a lot younger and stronger, but you're about to get your ass kicked from here to the state line... and I'm wearin' the boots that can do it!
You're a feisty old booger, aren't ya.
I thought we just settled that!
Don't you know you can't fight City Hall?
You can wrestle 'em!
Well, you got a fine horse. Where are you going to keep him?
With you.
[he walks on as Emma stops in her tracks]
Oh.
I just ain't had enough good times yet.
Well, the party's over, my friend. Someone just handed you the check.
God, does everybody have to put their head down and slog?
Most people do.

[after being turned down for a loan by the bank]
I'd go out on the streets, but you've only got one.

[to Jake, after telling him she's going to ask Bobby Jack to leave]
You sure have had a short childhood.
I'm a born again Christian!
Well, I sure hope they don't pass you the collection plate.
Can I have a beer?
In about 5 years you can!
I think you're banging Emma?
Banging? That's an ugly expression for that particular pleasure.
How about fucking?
I don't like that one a whole alot better! And, if I was, it would be none of your concern.
